modName: UFO or TCG Imperial Soldiers Followers
summary: This mod adds 3 Imperial Soldiers that you can recruit as followers
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/YMz86Ai.png[/img][/url][/center]===============================
TCG Imperial Soldiers Followers
===============================
This mod adds 3 Imperial Soldiers that you can recruit as followers.
You can find these soldiers in Castle Dour in Solitude. Don't worry they respawn if they die.
Bethesda didn't add any Imperial soldiers or Stormcloak soldiers as followers... so I had to create some myself.
This version adds only Imperial soldiers.

TCG stands for "Tradable companion gear".

This mod should be UFO compatible.

=============
Requirements:
=============
UFO mod made by fLokii:

UFO: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/[/url] (Recommended)

OR

The TCG mod made by fLokii: (Download the main files).
If you don't download this mod you would probably see naked Imperial Soldiers!

TCG: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8530/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8530/[/url] (No longer updated)

=========
Optional:
=========
A new version is uploaded, the imperial soldiers with names and they are essential.

========
Install:
========
Extract all the files into your Skyrim/Data folder. And remember to enable the mod! :)

=====
Bugs:
=====
Gray face bug, But they use the full-face helmet. I know I can fix it by converting the files to a .esm file and export textures.
But I don't want people download unnecessary texture files that are supposed to be in the game. But I can upload that version if you want me to.

========
Credits:
========
Credits goes to fLokii for making the TCG mod.
And thanks for letting me upload this mod with YOUR custom follower script included. :)

============
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?]Forever Free[/url]:
============
Is a modder resource made by mysticentity, by adding it to my description means that this mod will always be free. :)
author: aBaDmAn91
